tool_description: Analyzes neighbor cell relationships and adjacency requirements for handover optimization and interference coordination between cellular sites.

site_ids.description: Sites to analyze for neighbor relationships

max_neighbor_distance_km.description: Maximum distance to consider for neighbor analysis

signal_threshold_dbm.description: Minimum signal level for neighbor consideration

overlap_threshold_percent.description: Minimum coverage overlap percentage for neighbor relationship

error_messages: Insufficient sites: Minimum 2 sites required for neighbor analysis.
Invalid distance parameter: max_neighbor_distance_km must be between 1-50 km.
Invalid signal threshold: Signal threshold must be between -120 and -50 dBm.
Invalid overlap threshold: Overlap percentage must be between 1-50%.
usage: Provide site_ids and analysis parameters to identify neighbor relationships and handover requirements between cells.

neighbor_matrix.description: Site pair relationships and neighbor status

handover_candidates.description: Site pairs suitable for handover configuration

interference_risks.description: Site pairs with high interference potential
